snippet: The horrorcore rap group Insane Clown Posse courts mainstream notice on the Fuse music channel even as it contends with a sexual-harassment lawsuit and an F.B.I. report.
abstract: Controversial horrorcore rap group Insane Clown Posse is trying to maintain its underground reputation even as it makes appearances on Fuse cable channel to achieve mainstream acceptance; is also struggling with legal battle against Federal Bureau of Investigation, which listed its fans as a gang in 2011 report, and sexual harassment lawsuit brought by the band's former publicist.
lead_paragraph: The horrorcore rap group Insane Clown Posse courts mainstream notice on the Fuse music channel even as it contends with a sexual-harassment lawsuit and an F.B.I. report.

headline.main: Crisis for Insane Clown Posse: Getting Saner
headline.print_headline: Crisis for Insane Clown Posse: Getting Saner
